summary: Proto comments from the Temporal API are not included in the generated TypeScript API documentation, making protobufjs-generated classes lack explanatory text for their properties. Users want proto file comments to appear in the generated TypeScript API docs.
userImpact: Users cannot find property descriptions when browsing the generated API documentation and must refer to proto source files instead.
rootCause: protobufjs library does not extract and preserve proto comments during code generation process
proposedFix: Modify protobufjs to properly translate proto comments (// or /* */) into JSDoc comments for the generated TypeScript classes
resolutionDetails: protobufjs is no longer actively maintained (last commit May 2021) and the issue depends on upstream library changes
keyQuote: protobufjs isn't really maintained unfortunately, last commit was May 2021
